divs: Sighting DetailsPeople I have been watching these ufo activities all summer long over here in Eastlake, Ohio. The crafts leave lake erie around 12:30am and go onto land and disperse into different directions. North to South and even south east. I saw 2 crafts the shape of a hexagon traveling together back to the lake lake slowly decending at lower altitude. I have seen different styles of unknown origin, comming back to the lake at night also. I work in the aerospace business and these are not ours. On July 15,08 A craft flew in to left of me and fastly and floated and hovered in mid-air in my view. I knew what it was. It was non-hostile and I felt the heat comming off the craft. It changed from a limelight color to a light blue and then a bright white. It was watching me and it was curious of me. It was about 500ft.high. and non hostile. The duration of the activity was about 5 minutes. Then the craft whiteness slowly disipated down and I could see the make of the craft.It was was lightly transparent triangle with 2 huge white bulbs on the back end of the craft. Then the craft moved in mid-air once to build up power but not once but 3 times to build up power.Then it shot off as a purplelish red ball of light. The craft then took off pretty fast because with a wobble. It headed towards route 306 at a fast clip. I say it traveled from my head to 306 in 2 seconds which it about 1 mile away.
Summary: People they are visaully showing themselves to us!
